name: Caprarum Cursus (EN-LA)
description:
Do you want to revise your Latin declensions and have fun?

It's a racing game. You drive a goat and you have to catch Latin nouns. Each lap corresponds to specific case/declension.

What you need to know: 

SingularPluralnominativerosa rosae accusativerosam rosas genitiverosae rosārum dativerosae rosīs ablativerosā rosīs

Controls:

WASD: moving

Q: Salve! 

E: handbrake

Tab: in-car view

R: Stuck? Respawn!

I: help with Latin

Credits: 

Gamedev: Caton l'Aubergiste

Rose model and background: from Insularum Raider

Voix Salve: Luke A. Ranieri from Dominorum Raider.

Projectile : from Urbium Raider

Athena model: Thibaut Leblanc from Homerecredi

Sounds: La Sonothèque
